message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15000 to you, and I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $14000. This price not only reflects its true worth but also allows us to maintain a fair transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
